name: Cupboard
description: The client, a 43-year-old Singaporean mother, is currently unemployed as she needs to focus on her 16-year-old son’s behavioural and school issues. As part of an arrangement with the school, she must accompany and fetch him daily, which limits her ability to work. Her husband, an Indian PR, has also recently lost his job, and the family is struggling to cope financially. Addressing these household repairs and furniture needs would greatly improve their living environment and the client’s overall well-being, particularly given her health sensitivities and caregiving responsibilities.

name: Tablet
description:
Mr Hong, age 90, widowed lives with his nephew who is mute, deaf and intellectually disabled. 

Nephew does not work and stays at home most of the time. while he has been to a special needs school during his teenage years, he is not able to be meaningfully employed in the later years

a tablet would enable him to learn materials through videos, and for faster communication when social worker needs to reach out to him

name: Playmat
description:
A family with two young children is looking for a cushioned playmat or rug. As the family has a cat, they are looking for a playmat that can withstand cat scratches. Their downstairs neighbour has informed them that movements in the house can be quite audible. A cushioned playmat or rug would help reduce this noise and provide a comfortable play area for the children, whilst giving the parents peace of mind that they are not disrupting their neighbours.

Any donations would be greatly appreciated. Thank you!

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Kreta Ayer
contact.name: Lee Hui Feng

passiton.name: Mothercare Playmat
passiton.description: Very good condition. Delivery included
